data.news_body: Members of RIC at its meeting held on 16.01.2026 approved Draft Letter of Offer for seeking in-principle approval of the stock exchanges for issuance of fully paid up equity shares of the company aggregating upto Rs. 49.30 crores.

data.caption: Intimation For Change In Date Of Meeting Of Rights Issue Committee (RIC)
data.news_body: Refer to our outcome of Board Meeting dated 02.01.2026 we would like to inform that first meeting of RIC 2026 will be held on 16th January 2026 instead of 14th January 2026.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Raising of Funds
data.news_body: Board of Directors at its meeting held on 2nd January 2026 approved the raising of funds through Rights Issue and other matters incidental thereto.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of Bhandari Hosiery Exports Limited (The Company) - Approval Of The Board Of Directors For Rights Issue (2026)
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in its Meeting held on 2nd January 2026 have inter-alia transacted the following business:
1. discussed raising long term fresh Equity funds amounting to Rs. 49.30 crores through a Rights Issue (2026) 
2. confirmed that the Bombay Stock Exchange shall be requested to act as the Designated Stock Exchange for the purpose of the ensuring Rights Issue (2026). 
3. formation of a  focused Rights Issue Committee (RIC)
4. Next meeting of the RIC will be held on 14th January 2026 
The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 03:00 p.m. and concluded at 04:35 p.m.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
data.news_body: Board of Directors at their meeting held on 30.05.2025 took note  of completion of tenure of Mr. Surinder Kumar Kapoor (DIN:08442523) as a non executive independent director of the Company w.e.f. 30.05.2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at their meeting held on 30.05.2025 approved the appointment of Mr. Rohit Kumar Chhabra (DIN:11131326) and Ms. Sharon Arora (DIN:09450764) as an Additional Non Executive Independent Directors of the Company for a consecutive term of 5 years w.e.f. 30.05.2025 subject to approval of Shareholders in General Meeting.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
data.news_body: Board of Directors at their meeting held on 30.05.2025 recommended the final dividend of Rs. 0.02 per equity share (i.e. 2%) having face value of Rs. 1 each for the FY  2024-25.

data.caption: Results - Financial Year Ended 31St March 2025.
data.news_body: Board of Directors at their meeting held on 30.05.2025 has approved the  Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and year ended 31.03.2025 along with the Auditors Report received from Statutory Auditors of the Company.

data.caption: Results - Financial Year Ended 31St March 2025.
data.news_body: Board of Directors at their meeting held on 30.05.2025 has approved the  Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and year ended 31.03.2025 along with the Auditors Report received from Statutory Auditors of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for OUTCOME OF BOARD MEETING
data.news_body:
Board of Directors of the Company in its Meeting held on 30th May 2025 have transacted the following businesses:
1. Considered and approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on 31st March 2025  along with Auditors Report.
2. Recommended Final Dividend of Re 0.02/- per Equity Share  having Face Value of Re. 1/-  each for the Financial Year 2024-2025.
3. Approved the appointment of Secretarial Auditor of the Company for five consecutive years.
4. Take note of the completion of tenure of Mr. Surinder Kumar Kapoor (DIN: 08442523) as non-executive independent director of the company w.e.f. 30th May 2025.
5. Approved the appointment of Mr. Rohit Kumar Chhabra (DIN: 11131326) and Ms. Sharon Arora (DIN: 09450764) as an Additional Directors of the Company designated as Non-Executive Independent Director on the Board of the Company for a consecutive term of 5 years w.e.f. 30th  May 2025.

Bhandari Hosiery Exports Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 30/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 it is hereby informed that a meeting of the Board of Directors of Bhandari Hosiery Exports Limited  is scheduled to be held on Friday 30th May 2025 inter-alia to:
1. To consider and approve the Standalone Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Financial Year ended 31st March 2025 and take on record the Auditors Report on the Financials.
2. To consider and recommend final dividend if any on equity shares of the Company for the Financial Year ended 31st March 2025.

data.news_body: Raising of funds through Rights Issue

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of Bhandari Hosiery Exports Limited (The Company).
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 (read with Schedule III - Part A) and other applicable provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 please find herewith outcome of the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company held today i.e. on Wednesday 30th  April 2025 at 03:00 P.M. and concluded at 03:30 P.M. at the registered office of the Company.  

The following matters were considered:

1. The members of the board discussed about raising of long term funds by way of fresh Equity Share Capital to be utilised for long term working capital support and also to reduce part of the present secured bank debts of the company through a fresh Rights Issue.  

2. On receiving confirmation of the Board for the fresh Rights Issue the members of the board discussed about formation of a separate focused Rights Issue Committee (RIC).

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting Under Regulation 29(A) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Bhandari Hosiery Exports Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 30/04/2025 inter alia to consider and approve raising  long term Equity funds through a fresh Rights Issue with an objective inter alia to reduce the present secured debts of the company and to support the operations of the Company with Additional Working Capital.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Bhandari Hosiery Exports Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Bhandari Hosiery Exports Ltd on December 3, 2024 with reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Intimation of Right issue
data.news_body: The Right Issue Committee of the Company in its meeting held on 12th June, 2024 have transacted the following businesses:1. Recorded the In-principle approval received from NSE and BSE for the proposed Right Issue of fully paid Equity Shares Aggregating  up to Rs. 48 Cr.2. Approved the issue of 7,66,11,591 Equity Shares of Face Value of Rs. 1/- each at an issue price of Rs. 6.26/- per equity share  ( including premium of Rs. 5.26/- per equity share) for an amount aggregating up to Rs.  47.96 Cr to all existing  equity shareholders on a right basis in the ratio of 15 shares for every 32 shares held in the Company.3. Fixed Wednesday, 19th June, 2024 as the record date for the purpose of determining names of shareholders of the Company eligible to apply for the equity shares in the Right Issue of the Company. 4. Approved final Letter of Offer and other relevant documents in this regard.

data.caption: INTIMATION OF RECORD DATE FOR THE PURPOSE OF RIGHTS ISSUE.
data.news_body: The Company has fixed Wednesday, 19th June, 2024, as the record date for the purpose of determining names of shareholders of the company eligible to apply for the Equity Shares in the Rights issue of the Company.

data.caption: Outcome Of Meeting Of Right Issue Committee Of Bhandari Hosiery Exports Limited (The Company) - Proposed Rights Issue Of Upto Rs. 48 Crores.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and other applicable provisions of SEBI LODR Regulations 2015, the Right Issue Committee of the Company in its meeting held on 12th June, 2024 have transacted the following businesses:1. The Right Issue Committee recorded the in-principle approval received from NSE and BSE for the proposed Right Issue of fully paid Equity Shares aggregating up to Rs. 48 Cr.2. The Committee approved issue of 7,66,11,591 Equity Shares of Face Value of Rs. 1/- each at an issue price of Rs. 6.26/- per equity share (including premium of Rs. 5.26/- per Equity Share ) for an amount aggregating upto Rs. 47.96 Cr to all  existing equity shareholders of the company on right basis in the ratio of 15 shares for every 32 shares held in the company.3. Wednesday, 19th June, 2024  as the record date for the purpose of determining the eligible shareholders to apply for the equity shares in the right issue.4. Final Letter of Offer and other Relevant documents in this regard.

data.caption: Rights Issue Of Upto Rs. 48 Crores - Intimation Of Receipt Of In-Principle Approval From BSE And NSE And Meeting Of Right Issue Committee
data.news_body: Pursuant to applicable provisions of SEBI LODR Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform the following :1. In-principle approval has been received from BSE and NSE for the proposed Right issue of fully paid Equity Shares  aggregating up to Rs. 48 Crores.2. After receiving the in-principle approvals of the BSE and NSE, Meeting of the Right Issue Committee is scheduled to be held on 12th June, 2024 at 10:00 AM at the Registered Office of the Company  to take decisions with respect to the offer price, the offer ratio, the Record date, the Schedule of the Right issue after discussing with the RTA of the Company.3. Right Issue Committee will also approve the contents of Letter of Offer, Abridged Letter of Offer, Composite Application Form and Rights Entitlement Letter.

data.caption: Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of Bhandari Hosiery Exports Limited (The Company).
data.news_body: 1. Considered and approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2023 (Copy enclosed), along with the unmodified Auditor''s Report received from M/s Raj Gupta & Co, Statutory Auditors of the Company. A declaration pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI (LODR) is also enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of Bhandari Hosiery Exports Limited (The Company).
data.news_body:
Board of Directors of the Company in its Meeting held on 26th May, 2023, have inter-alia, transacted the following businesses:

1. Considered and approved the Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2023.
2. Recommended a final dividend of Re 0.01/- per Equity Share (i.e. l%) having Face Value of Re. 1/- (Rupee One Only) each for the Financial Year 2022-2023.
3. The Board considered and approved the proposal of raising equity capital through the Rights Issue to partly finance the Expansion Plan that has been taken up by the Company with the loan assistance from State Bank of India.
4. Appointment of Mr. Rajeev Bhambri as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for the Financial Year 2023-24 with immediate effect.

data.caption: Revised Unaudited Financial Results As On Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31.12.2020.
data.news_body:
With reference to the outcome of board meeting held on 13.02.2021, we would like to inform you that due to error/mistake while setting off tax expenses figures of profit for the continuing operations after tax in column quarter ended 31.12.2020 and year to date for the current year 31.12.2020 were wrongly mentioned as 154.16 and 35.93 instead of 135.16 and 16.93 respectively.

Further we declare that this was totally unintentional error/mistake. We produce the correct figures, this figure mismatch was due to set off of tax expenses. So net profit available for shareholders in column quarter ended 31.12.2020 and year to date for the current year 31.12.2020 are also considered as 135.16 and 16.93 respectively. We are hereby attaching revised unaudited financial results for quarter ended as on 31.12.2020 and nine months ended as on 31.12.2020.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31.12.2020.
data.news_body: With reference to the Notice issued on 04th February, 2021 we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on 13th February, 2021 has inter-alia approved the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended 31st December, 2020.
